description: Generate business leads using AI to intelligently find relevant businesses.

sector.title: Sector
sector.description: Select the business sector to generate leads for.

country.title: Country (Optional)

state.title: State / Province (Optional)
state.description: State or province to narrow down the business search.

city.title: City / Suburb (Optional)
city.description: City or suburb where businesses are located.

postcode.title: Postcode / ZIP Code (Optional)
postcode.description: Postal or ZIP code to refine the search area.

keyword.title: Keyword (Optional)
keyword.description: Optional keyword to refine the business search (e.g., clinic, software, agency).

maxResults.title: Maximum Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of business leads to return.
